OOC: No offense taken, rdahl. I'll repost my attacks on your characters.

:::The Protectrons/Torca/Ratchet/Sideswipe/Sky Lynx/Orion/Wheeljack/Vulois:::

::Chromedome aims at Triggerhappy and fires 25 rapid laser blasts from each 
gun::
~~~~~
::Brainstorm transforms into jet mode and flies after Triggerhappy::
Brainstorm: You dont escape that easy!
::he fires 4 photon blasts from each gun at Triggerhappy::
~~~~~
::Hardhead fires 25 crystal shards from each gun at Drag Strip::
~~~~~
::Highbrow shoots a stream of acid from each gun at Wildrider::
~~~~~
::Torca fires 2 charges at ::
~~~~~
::Ratchet fires 15 shots from each blaster and two tusk missles at Drag 
Strip::
~~~~~
::Sky Lynx fires 2 missles from each gun at Drag Strip::
~~~~~
::Sideswipe fires 25 shots and 2 missles at Wildrider::
~~~~~
::Orion fires 2 missles at Wildrider::
~~~~~
Wheeljack: Yes, lets.   We'll go outside of the base, hook these up, and see 
what it does to some of my test drones(All im going to do is make the 
defences fire at the drones and destroy them.  If this isnt legal, please 
tell me).
~~~~~
::Vulois heard Thundercracker's words::
Vulois: I am in the chamber to the right.  You have come to a good place 
Thundercracker. I am Vulois, a bot dedicated to ending this war.  Come and we 
will talk about our experiences.

--part1_62.c01325d.27c09aba_boundary
